levelList.desc:
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on target (Max 3)
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Combustion] on target (Max 3)
[WhenUse] Heal 10 SP
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [AaCePcBq], [AaCePcBp] and [AaCePcBo] (max 10)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) [AaCePcBq], [AaCePcBp] and [AaCePcBo] instead
levelList.name: Be Fearless!

levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">[StartBattle] Apply 4 [Breath] and +4 [Breath] Count to 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard</style>
Coin Power +1 for every 10 [AaCePcBq] on self (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Next turn, the leftmost Skill Slot of 1 other ally with the highest Max HP gains +(Highest Reson.) Aggro (Once per turn)
- At 4+ highest A-Reson., apply 2 Protection to the ally next turn when they gain Aggro (Once per turn)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [AaCePcBq] (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) [AaCePcBq] instead
levelList.name: To Me!

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [ParryingResultDown] and 1 [Binding] next turn for every 6 [AaCePcBq] on self

levelList.desc:
Deal more damage based on target's missing HP (+0.5% damage per 1% missing HP, max +50%)
[StartBattle] Apply 3 Offense Level Up to 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard
[WhenUse] Every Reson. of the highest Reson. adds 20% chance that this unit orders the ally on its immediate right(on the Dashboard) to use [CoverAttack] this turn.
- At 4+ highest A-Reson., apply 2 'Damage Up' to the ally
- At 4+ Pride A-Reson., apply 2 additional Pride Power Up
Coin Power +1 for every 5 [Laceration] on target (Max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [AaCePcBp] (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) [AaCePcBp] instead
levelList.name: Pursue Them to the End!

levelList.desc:
Deal more damage based on target's missing HP (+0.5% damage per 1% missing HP, max +50%)
Coin Power +1 for every 10 [AaCePcBo] on self (Max 2)
[EndSkill] If the target is Staggered or defeated, (1+(Highest A-Reson./2)) allies with the least SP heal 15 SP, gain 4 Poise, and gain +6 Poise Count. (6 times max. Max # of allies that can be healed: 6)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 1) [AaCePcBo] (max 7)
- If it was an A-Reson., gain (highest Reson. +2) [AaCePcBo] instead
levelList.name: Harpoon of Obsession

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Burn by Bleed on target

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Heal 5 SP for 4 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard (4 times max)
[StartBattle] Gain Shield by (3 * [AaCePcBq] on self)
[OnSucceedEvade] Gain 2 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
[OnSucceedEvade] After succesfully evading, use Envy 'Pursue Them to the End!' Skill
levelList.name: Do Not Fear
